casebody.data:
NC BOARD OF PHARMACY
v.
COMMISSION. No. 673A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2006. Carson Carmichael, III, M. Denise Stanford, Anna Baird Choi, Matthew W. Sawchak, Paul K. Sun, Jr., Julia F. Youngman, Stephen D. Feldman, Raleigh, for NC Board of Pharmacy. William W. Plyler, Stephen T. Smith, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, Raleigh, for Rules of Review Commission, et al. Charlotte A. Mitchell, Stanford D. Baird, William G. Scoggin, Daniel J. Palmieri, Raleigh, Ann M. Anderson, Research Triangle Park, for NC Citizens for Business, et al. Amy E. Pickle, for NC Coastal Federation, et al. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Dale J. Atkinson, Julia C. Works, Evanston, IL, for NABP.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of May 2006 for Extension of Time to File an Amici Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Amici (American Pharmacists Association and the N.C. Association of Pharmacists) shall have up to and including the 30th day of May 2006 to file and serve their brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of May 2006."
